title: This Week's Top Stories - TIME's Person of the Year, California's Sneaky Gun Law & More
itunes:title: This Week's Top Stories - TIME's Person of the Year, California's Sneaky Gun Law & More
description:
Elon Musk becomes TIME Magazine's 2021 Person of the Year, California governor Gavin Newsom proposes a novel way to ban assault weapons, a Formula 1 race ends in controversy, and more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
